div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 998px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 261px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #0066cc;

display: inline-block; font-size: 26px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#0066cc, #56aeff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: POLA LEGAL - SUBSCRIPTION SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 998px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 261px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#666666, #959595); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Dual Payment Model: Monthly Subscription (Platform Access) + Pay-Per-Use (Services)

switch.text: Dual Payment Model: Monthly Subscription (Platform Access) + Pay-Per-Use (Services)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 177px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
SubscriptionPlan Model
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Fields:
• name: CharField ("Basic Membership")
• description: TextField
• price: DecimalField (3000.00 TZS)
• billing_period: CharField ("monthly")
• features: JSONField
- Platform access
- Legal resources access
- Search consultants
- Basic support
• is_active: BooleanField
• created_at: DateTimeField
• updated_at: DateTimeField
Purpose: Platform access subscription
Revenue: 100% to Platform

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 177px; margin-left: 662px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
UserSubscription Model
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Fields:
• user: ForeignKey(PolaUser)
• subscription_plan: ForeignKey(SubscriptionPlan)
• status: CharField
- active, expired, cancelled, pending
• start_date: DateTimeField
• end_date: DateTimeField
• auto_renew: BooleanField (default=True)
• payment_method: CharField
• last_payment_date: DateTimeField
• next_billing_date: DateTimeField
• cancelled_at: DateTimeField (nullable)
• created_at: DateTimeField
Methods:
• is_active() → bool
• renew_subscription() → void
• cancel_subscription() → void

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 177px; margin-left: 1302px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
PricingConfiguration Model
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Fields:
• service_type: CharField (choices)
- MOBILE_ADVOCATE (25,000 TZS)
- MOBILE_LAWYER (35,000 TZS)
- MOBILE_PARALEGAL (15,000 TZS)
- PHYSICAL_CONSULTATION (60,000 TZS)
- TEMPLATE_DOWNLOAD (1,500 TZS)
- GENERATED_DOCUMENT (3,000 TZS)
- STUDY_MATERIAL_BASIC (5,000 TZS)
- STUDY_MATERIAL_ADVANCED (15,000 TZS)
• price: DecimalField
• platform_commission: DecimalField (60%)
• consultant_share: DecimalField (40%)
• is_active: BooleanField
• created_at: DateTimeField
Purpose: Per-transaction pricing
Revenue: Split 60/40

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 217, 213), rgb(68, 39, 36)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 740px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

↓

Status: Inactive

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
User chooses
subscription plan
↓
3,000 TZS/month
↓
Redirected to
payment gateway

━━━━━━━━━━━
AzamPay
integration
↓
Payment processed
↓
Transaction record
created

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

━━━━━━━━━━━━
Payment confirmed
↓

created
↓

↓
Platform access
granted

consultations

div.div:
6️⃣ RENEWAL
━━━━━━━━━━━━
30 days later
↓
Auto-renewal
check
↓
If enabled:
Charge 3,000 TZS
↓
Extend 30 days

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.div:
7️⃣ EXPIRY/CANCEL
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
User cancels OR
payment fails
↓
Status: Expired/
Cancelled
↓
Platform access
restricted

before proceeding

Verify consultant is
APPROVED
↓

via AzamPay

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1080px; margin-left: 1001px;

Platform: 60%
↓
Consultant/Uploader:
40%
↓
Record in
ConsultantEarnings
or UploaderEarnings

↓
If document:
Generate/Download
↓
Record purchase

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1080px; margin-left: 1481px;

━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Update records
↓
Send receipts
↓
Update consultant
earnings
↓
User/consultant
feedback

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130));
fill: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130));
fill: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 858px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1317px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Subscription Management APIs
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
GET /api/subscriptions/plans/
→ List all available subscription plans
POST /api/subscriptions/subscribe/
Body: {plan_id, payment_method}
→ Create new subscription
GET /api/subscriptions/my-subscription/
→ Get current user's subscription details
Response: {plan, status, start_date, end_date, auto_renew}
PUT /api/subscriptions/my-subscription/
Body: {auto_renew: true/false}
→ Update subscription settings
POST /api/subscriptions/cancel/
→ Cancel current subscription
POST /api/subscriptions/renew/
→ Manually renew subscription
GET /api/subscriptions/history/
→ Get subscription payment history

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 898px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1317px; margin-left: 962px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pricing Configuration APIs
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
GET /api/pricing/configurations/
→ List all service pricing (8 types)
Response: [{service_type, price, platform_commission, consultant_share}]
GET /api/pricing/configurations/{service_type}/
→ Get specific service pricing
Example: /api/pricing/configurations/MOBILE_LAWYER/
POST /api/consultations/book/
Body: {consultant_id, consultation_type, date, time}
→ Book consultation (price auto-calculated)
POST /api/call-credits/purchase/
Body: {bundle_id, quantity}
→ Purchase call credits
POST /api/documents/generate/
Body: {template_id, user_data}
→ Generate document (auto-charge based on PricingConfiguration)
POST /api/materials/purchase/
Body: {material_id}
→ Purchase study material

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

• name
• price (3,000)
• billing_period
• features

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1930px; margin-left: 511px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
UserSubscription
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• id
• user_id (FK)
• subscription_plan_id (FK)
• status
• start_date
• end_date
• auto_renew

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1930px; margin-left: 771px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
PricingConfiguration
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• id
• service_type (8 types)
• price
• platform_commission
• consultant_share

ConsultationBooking
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• id
• user_id (FK)
• consultant_id (FK)
• booking_type
• status
• total_amount

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

• transaction_type
• amount

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 249, 230), rgb(28, 23, 7)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(204, 153, 0), rgb(150, 106, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1930px; margin-left: 1551px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
ConsultantEarnings
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• id
• consultant_id (FK)
• booking_id (FK)
• gross_amount
• platform_fee (60%)
• net_earnings (40%)

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(16, 115, 158), rgb(84, 169, 206)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(16, 115, 158), rgb(84, 169, 206));
fill: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130));
fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 237, 218), rgb(23, 45, 28)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(40, 167, 69), rgb(43, 152, 68));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 237, 218), rgb(23, 45, 28)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(40, 167, 69), rgb(43, 152, 68));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2157px; margin-left: 62px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
SUBSCRIPTION REVENUE
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Monthly: 3,000 TZS/user
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Platform Revenue: 100%
Consultant Share: 0%
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Purpose:
• Platform maintenance
• Infrastructure costs
• Development
• Support services
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Example:
1,000 users = 3,000,000 TZS

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 243, 205), rgb(39, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 193, 7), rgb(125, 72, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 418px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2157px; margin-left: 482px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
CONSULTATION REVENUE
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Advocate: 25,000 | Lawyer: 35,000 | Paralegal: 15,000
Physical: 60,000 TZS per session
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Platform Revenue: 60%
Consultant Share: 40%
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Example (Lawyer @ 35,000 TZS):
• Platform: 21,000 TZS (60%)
• Consultant: 14,000 TZS (40%)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
100 consultations = 2,100,000 TZS platform
1,400,000 TZS consultants

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(207, 226, 255), rgb(30, 46, 71)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(13, 110, 253), rgb(78, 161, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 418px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2157px; margin-left: 962px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 215, 218), rgb(68, 40, 42)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(220, 53, 69), rgb(255, 129, 143));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2157px; margin-left: 1442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
TOTAL REVENUE EXAMPLE
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
1,000 subscriptions: 3,000,000 TZS
100 consultations: 2,100,000 TZS
500 documents: 3,000,000 TZS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Total Platform: 8,100,000 TZS/month
Total to Consultants: 1,400,000 TZS
Total to Uploaders: 2,000,000 TZS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Grand Total: 11,500,000 TZS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Platform Share: 70%
Contributors: 30%

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2477px; margin-left: 42px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
✅ SUBSCRIPTION REQUIREMENT
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• All users MUST have active subscription
• Subscription grants platform access only
• No access to services without subscription
• Subscription check on every API request
• Auto-renewal to prevent service interruption

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2477px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
✅ PRICING FLEXIBILITY
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• PricingConfiguration for all service types
• Easy price updates without code changes
• Different prices for different consultant types
• Admin can adjust pricing anytime
• Support for promotional pricing
• Bulk purchase discounts possible

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2477px; margin-left: 842px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
✅ REVENUE TRACKING
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Separate tables for consultant earnings
• Separate tables for uploader earnings
• Clear 60/40 split calculation
• Transaction history for auditing
• Monthly payout reports
• Tax-ready financial records

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 217, 213), rgb(68, 39, 36)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(174, 65, 50), rgb(236, 143, 130));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2477px; margin-left: 1242px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
✅ CONSULTANT PREREQUISITES
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Must have active subscription
• Must submit registration request
• Admin approval required
• ConsultantProfile created after approval
• Only approved consultants in listings
• Only approved consultants can accept bookings
• Consultant status checked on every booking

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
